message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but that's a bit too steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $80 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate you meeting me halfway Alice, but I'm on a tight budget.  Would you consider $90?

Hi Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
